desc: This is the homepage for American historian and New York Times bestselling author Tony Castro's personally signed books. The author of eight books, Tony is a former Washington Post national correspondent and Sports Illustrated senior writer. He is a graduate of Baylor and a Nieman Fellow at Harvard University.

layout.text: is the No.1 new book release in America, chronicling Roger Maris and Mickey Mantle's historic chase of the most cherished record in all sports... Babe Ruth's legendary 60 home runs in a single season. Order your personally signed books by American historian and New York Times bestselling author Tony Castro
